data.comment: In the minute -1, It is reported that 3095 spectators are in attendance today.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 2, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Shimizu throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Shimizu.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Yuito Suzuki (Shimizu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 8, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Urawa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Throw-in Urawa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Urawa.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 14, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Free kick Urawa.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 17, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Shimizu, close to Urawa's area.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 20, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Urawa.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Goal! Urawa have got their heads in front thanks to a Ryosuke Yamanaka strike.
In the minute 23, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Urawa a goal kick.
Urawa needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Urawa.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
In the minute 31, Shimizu pushes forward through Junior Dutra, whose finish on goal is saved.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Goal kick for Urawa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Urawa.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Shimizu.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Shimizu.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Junior Dutra is booked for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 40, Shimizu's Junior Dutra gets in a shot on goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In Shizuoka Shimizu attack through Yuito Suzuki. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 45, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Shimizu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The first half has been concluded at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Shizuoka.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Shimizu throw-in in Urawa's half.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 50, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Shimizu's Yuito Suzuki breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Urawa drives forward and Koya Yuruki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Daiki Hashioka for Urawa is back on the field again.
Hiroyuki Kimura waits before resuming play because Daiki Hashioka for Urawa is still down.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Urawa.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Important block from the Urawa defence as Kenta Nishizawa fires in a strike for Shimizu.
In the minute 54, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Yosuke Kawai for Shimizu has been booked by Hiroyuki Kimura and receives a first yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Daiki Hashioka for Urawa who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Urawa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Urawaâ€™s Daiki Hashioka is on his feet again at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu drives towards goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 58, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shinzo Koroki puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 60, That's a fine assist from Leonardo.
Shimizu's Elsinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Teerasil Dangda is on a sub for Junior Dutra for Shimizu.
Peter Cklamovski (Shimizu) is making a third substitution, with Yusuke Goto replacing Carlinhos Junior.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's second substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Hikaru Naruoka replacing Elsinho.
In the minute 63, Urawa drive upfield and Ryosuke Yamanaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Yuito Suzuki for Shimizu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Urawa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Urawa defender.
In the minute 66, Urawa have a goal kick.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Shimizu's Renato Augusto attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Takahiro Sekine is replacing Koya Yuruki for Urawa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 69, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team have replaced Yuki Muto with Quenten Martinus. This is the second substitution made today by Tsuyoshi Otsuki.
Daiki Hashioka (Urawa) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 71, Valdo (Shimizu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Shimizu's Yuito Suzuki gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 74, Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Urawa a goal kick.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 75, Can Urawa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
In Shizuoka, Shinzo Koroki of Urawa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 77, Tsuyoshi Otsuki is making the team's third substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Kosuke Taketomi replacing Shinzo Koroki.
Kenyu Sugimoto is replacing Leonardo for the away team.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Urawa's Kosuke Taketomi is on target but unsuccessful.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Ryo Takeuchi with Mitsunari Musaka.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 82, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 87, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tsuyoshi Otsuki (Urawa) is making a fifth substitution, with Ewerton replacing Kazuki Nagasawa.
Shimizu's Teerasil Dangda is whistled for offside at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Renato Augusto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
That's full-time at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. The final score is 1-2.
Goal! Teerasil Dangda pulls one back for Shimizu to make it 1-2.
Great play from Yusuke Goto to set up the goal.
Valdo (Shimizu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
